title: Powerful 7.3 Magnitude Earthquake Hits Nepal
teaser: NPR's Melissa Block talks to Kathmandu-based freelance writer Donatella Lorch about the most recent earthquake in Nepal, which came just three weeks after a major quake killed more than 8,000 people.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
